migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Add JSON Schema to Nx configuration files
migrations.name: 14-2-0-add-json-schema

migrations.description: Remove default collection from configuration to switch to prompts for collection
migrations.name: 14-2-0-remove-default-collection

migrations.description: Replace all ./ and ../ in outputs with absolute paths
migrations.name: 14-2-0-replace-relative-outputs-with-absolute

migrations.description: Replace targetDependencies with targetDefaults
migrations.name: 14.3.4-create-target-defaults

migrations.description: Replace implicitDependencies with namedInputs + target inputs
migrations.name: 15.0.0-migrate-to-inputs

migrations.description: Prefix outputs with {workspaceRoot}/{projectRoot} if needed
migrations.name: 15.0.0-prefix-outputs

migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Adds @swc/core and @swc-node as a dev dep if you are using them (repeated due to prior mistake)
migrations.name: add-swc-deps-again

migrations.description: Adds @typescript-eslint/utils as a dev dep
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-deps

migrations.description: Switch from  @typescript-eslint/experimental-utils to @typescript-eslint/utils in all rules and rules.spec files
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-rules

migrations.description: Stop hashing eslint config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-eslint-inputs

migrations.description: Add node_modules to root eslint ignore
migrations.name: add-eslint-ignore

migrations.description: Exclude jest.config.ts from tsconfig where missing.
migrations.name: exclude-jest-config-from-ts-config

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 28 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest28#configuration-options)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-28

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 28 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest28)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-28

migrations.description: Stop hashing jest spec files and config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-jest-inputs

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Explicitly enable sourceAnalysis for all workspaces extending from npm.json or core.json (this was default behavior prior to 14.2)
migrations.name: 14-2-0-enable-source-analysis

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-commands to nx:run-commands
migrations.name: 14-8-0-change-run-commands-executor

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Rename .lib.swcrc to .swcrc for better SWC support throughout the workspace
migrations.name: rename-swcrc-config

migrations.description: Update usages of webpack executors to @nrwl/webpack
migrations.name: update-webpack-executor

migrations.description: Adds babel.config.json to the hash of all tasks
migrations.name: add-babel-inputs

migrations.description: Update usages of rollup executors to @nrwl/rollup
migrations.name: update-rollup-executor

migrations.description: Update `@nrwl/web/babel` preset to `@nrwl/js/babel` for projects that have a .babelrc file.
migrations.name: update-babel-preset

migrations.description: Add @nrwl/linter, @nrwl/cypress, @nrwl/jest, @nrwl/rollup if they are used
migrations.name: add-dropped-dependencies
